enWisdom: Forbearance is the perfection of intellect
Forbearance (or wisdom) is light, [and] its essence is the intellect

Wisdom: لَنْ يُزَانَ الْعَقْلُ حَتَّى يُوَازِرَهُ الْحِلْمُ
enWisdom: The intellect will never be adorned until it is complemented by forbearance
Adorning oneself with forbearance (or knowledge) is from the best intelligence
With intellect, forbearance [and judiciousness] becomes abundant

Wisdom: لَا خَيْرَ فِي عَقْلٍ لَا يُقَارِنُهُ حِلْمٌ
enWisdom: There is no good in an intellect that is not accompanied by forbearance
